name: 100 Tile Challenge
description:
Can you paint 100 tiles before your oponent? Play vs CPU or vs a friend in this strategy game full of color.

How the movement works:
  • Tiles of your own color subtract fewer moves.
  • Tiles of the opponent's color subtract more moves.
  • Neutral tiles spend only one move.
Controls:

Choose movement:

A W S D or Arrow keys

Confirm  movement: Enter key

Use objects: Q and E

  • Bomb: Paint an area around you.
  • Throw bomb: Paints an area in a zone of your choice
  • Arrow: Paints a straight line in any direction
  • Magic: Paints a spiral

(In local mode both players use the same controller)
